name: Flappy Airship 2
description:
Flappy Bird with power ups and coin collecting.

Controls:

Click left side to jump. (Space)

Click right side to use power up. (Left Ctrl)

Power ups:

Blue - invincibility.

Red - slow time.

Crate - row of coins.

Alien orb - magnet.

Made with ct.js engine.

Graphics by Mike Moore.

Music by Slaleky.
